name: Teams
description: A Deathmatch only wad for Doom2. holes for each player to start in. Each person gets Large main arena, and 4 overlooking rooms that overlook one another, some teleporters, balanced weapon loadout at each start. Designed for 4 players 2 on 2, but is just fine in a free for all. A team must work together to get the plasma gun (ultimate dm weapon)
